title: Leash Free Dog Park, Bookcases, Designer Lighting*, Package Receiving
posting_body: ['Retreat at Sweetwater', '3355 Sweetwater Rd, Lawrenceville, GA, 30044', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 59', 'OR Text', '59', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'WELCOME HOME', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 767 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'With premium finishes and wide-open spaces, each newly renovated floor plan from Retreat at Sweetwater brings you unparalleled luxury without sacrificing on comfort.', 'Features', '- Hardwood-Style Flooring*', '- Modern Interior Paint Finishes*', '- Tray Ceilings*', '- Designer Lighting*', '- Upgraded Hardware*', '- Two Inch Blinds*', '- Crown Molding*', '- Ceiling Fans*', '- Double Vanity*', '- Bookcases', '- New Kitchen Appliance Package*', '- Fireplace*', '- Walk-In Closets*', '*', 'In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Leash Free Dog Park', '- Package Receiving', '- Optional Garage Parking*', '- Convenient Online Rent Payment', '- Online Maintenance Request', '- Carwash', '- New Pool Lounge Area', '- Cyber Café', '- New Online Services', '- Zero Deposit Community', '- Sparkling Swimming Pool', '- Play Park', '- Outdoor Kitchens', '- Fitness Studio', '- Surface Parking', '*Additional Fee', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Pet Monthly Rent Max: $20', 'Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 pet fee (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet rent is $20 per month.', 'Aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our leasing office for our pet policy.', 'Pet Rent Basis: Per Home', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Policy Fee Min/Max: $300 - $600', 'Income Requirements:', 'Require 3x the monthly rent and must show proof of income.', 'gk1sTj8l']
